content.question: Let <math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> be the function given by <math alttext="f of x equals, 2 times cosine x, plus 3 times e raised to the x power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>cos</mi><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>. What is the value of <math alttext="f prime of 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

topic.text: 2.7: Derivatives of cos x, sin x, ex, and ln x

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
